General.Name: Sichuan Dowell Science and Technology Inc
General.Description: Sichuan Dowell Science and Technology Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells leather chemicals in China. The company offers tanning materials, leather functional additives, finishing materials, colorants, industrial coating, and waterborne wood paints; and wood adhesive, as well as provides intelligent device. It also exports its products. Sichuan Dowell Science and Technology Inc. was founded in 2003 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 89, Xinyuan South Road, Chengdu, China

2.Name: Ms. Hong  Li
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
